main event: May Meislin, a carpenter, observed a glowing red object hover about 75 feet above the Salt Springs Reservoir before it suddenly accelerated and disappeared.
interesting points: The object hovered for approximately 2-3 minutes before becoming intensely bright., The sighting lasted for about 30 seconds., The object was described as larger than a car and shaped like a ball., No other objects were observed in the area during the sighting., Weather conditions included wind at 8 knots and a temperature of 77F with low clouds.
witness description: Mr. May Meislin, a carpenter from Sacramento, Calif.
